recent_facts: Artie was killed by a vending machine.
Artie is now in the Character Creation Void.

last_scene: Artie attempted to buy chips from a vending machine in his office breakroom. A freak electrical surge delivered a critical hit, killing him and transporting him to a digital void.
chapter_so_far: Artie died in an office breakroom accident and entered the System's Character Creation Void.
key_facts_ring: Artie argued with a 'Break-O-Matic 3000' vending machine over a stuck bag of chips.
Artie kicked the machine, triggering a massive electrical surge.
The System registered a 'Critical Hit' of -12 HP, reducing Artie's health to 0.
Artie's physical form and mundane items (wallet, change, tie) dissolved into data.
Artie arrived in the Character Creation Void and was greeted by a System Notification.
The System began calculating Artie's base stats based on his previous life performance.
